name: SUN, SEA & FUN !!!
description: When in Baguio, buckle up, sit back and relax while I drive you for an hour and a half to a beautiful piece of paradise.  Swim into the glistening blue sea, plunge into the pool, row a kayak, paddle a boat, explore the beautifully landscaped surroundings of this luxurious resort, take a rest over a glass of fresh fruit juice or your favorite drink, and dine at Olive's international restaurant.
